meanings.definition: To keep or put (something) in a steady position so that it does not fall.
meanings.sent1: She was balancing the books carefully on the edge of the table.
meanings.sent2: The acrobat was balancing on a tightrope at the circus.
meanings.sent3: The cat was balancing a toy mouse on its nose, trying to impress its owner.
meanings.sent4: Life is like balancing on a tightrope, one wrong move and you fall.
meanings.sent5: The chef's secret to a perfect dish is balancing the flavors just right.
